violation.message: StringBuffer constructor is initialized with size 16, but has at least 76 characters appended.
violation.popup-message: StringBuffer constructor is initialized with size 16, but has at least 76 characters appended.

violation.message: Avoid concatenating nonliterals in a StringBuffer constructor or append().
violation.popup-message: Avoid concatenating nonliterals in a StringBuffer constructor or append().

violation.message: Avoid appending characters as strings in StringBuffer.append.
violation.popup-message: Avoid appending characters as strings in StringBuffer.append.

violation.message: StringBuffer.append is called 3 consecutive times with literal Strings. Use a single append with a single String.
violation.popup-message: StringBuffer.append is called 3 consecutive times with literal Strings. Use a single append with a single String.

violation.message: Avoid appending characters as strings in StringBuffer.append.
violation.popup-message: Avoid appending characters as strings in StringBuffer.append.
